item.title: LexicalAT: Lexical-Based Adversarial Reinforcement Training for Robust Sentiment Classification
item.description: Recent work has shown that current text classification models are fragile and sensitive to simple perturbations. In this work, we propose a novel adversarial training approach, LexicalAT, to improve the robustness of current classification models. The proposed approach consists of a generator and a classifier. The generator learns to generate examples to attack the classifier while the classifier learns to defend these attacks.
